column2: You hear word that an orc raid is being prepared against you. Strengthen the defenses!
column3: You hear word that an orc raid is being prepared against you. Strengthen the defenses!

column2: An orc warlord from your court is preparing an army to invade a foreign realm.
column3: An orc warlord from your court is preparing an army to invade a foreign realm.

column2: You receive word that a massive orc horde is preparing to march against your lands. Let us hope we have the strength to repel them!
column3: You receive word that a massive orc horde is preparing to march against your lands. Let us hope we have the strength to repel them!

column2: One of your warlords has gathered a large horde, and is preparing to lead it out for pillage and slaughter.
column3: One of your warlords has gathered a large horde, and is preparing to lead it out for pillage and slaughter.

column2: We need more of his kind!
column3: We need more of his kind!

column2: By all that is holy, your new wife is a monster! Not the fair maid you were promised... what cruel joke is this?
column3: By all that is holy, your new wife is a monster! Not the fair maid you were promised... what cruel joke is this?

column2: Kill it! Kill it with fire!
column3: Kill it! Kill it with fire!

column2: Actually, I kind of like her...
column3: Actually, I kind of like her...

column2: A few women have joined your inner circle, and have become devout worshippers of the Dark Lord!
column3: A few women have joined your inner circle, and have become devout worshippers of the Dark Lord!
